body.p: The underlying pool of instruments may also include instruments that:

li.p: reduce the cash flow variability of the instruments in paragraph B4.1.23 and, when combined with the instruments in paragraph B4.1.23, result in cash flows that are solely payments of principal and interest on the principal amount outstanding (eg an interest rate cap or floor or a contract that reduces the credit risk on some or all of the instruments in paragraph B4.1.23); or
align the cash flows of the tranches with the cash flows of the pool of underlying instruments in paragraph B4.1.23 to address differences in and only in:
whether the interest rate is fixed or floating;
the currency in which the cash flows are denominated, including inflation in that currency; or
the timing of the cash flows.
